1.22.name: wordpress/application-maker-crm-edition
1.22.description:
Application Maker | CRM Edition

Version: 1.23 | CRM Edition | Last update date: 27 mai 2013. And more releases to come soon.

Last update: fixing a bug on the Shortcode to add a contact form on your wesite. More infos about this here: http://apmcrm2013.15gl.net/how-to-add-a-form-on-you-web-site-to-capture-leads/

For more informations, we have now done a basic simple plugin minisite specially to support this plugin: http://apmcrm2013.15gl.net

SEND US YOUR FEEDBACKS AND IDEAS > We are continuously upgrading and improving the system, any comments welcome... write to us, you can find our email on the "15CRM" settings page at the bottom
